sqlMap.select:
select p.id, p.category_code as `category.code`, cat.name as `category.name`, p.subcat_code as `subCat.code`, subcat.name as `subCat.code`, p.name, p.detail, p.price, p.sale_price as salePrice, p.quantity, p.image, p.special, p.sale, p.name_search as nameSearch from product p, category_mst cat, category_mst subcat where p.category_code = cat.code and p.subcat_code = subcat.code
p.id = #id#
p.category_code = #cateCode#
p.subcat_code = #subcatCode#
p.name like #name#
p.special = #special#
p.sale = #sale#
